rukus.text: 53|1|Sapatha naksatrera, yakhana ta haya astamita [1]
53|2|tomadera sangi [1] bibhranta naya, bipathagami'o naya
53|3|ara tini managara katha balena na [1].
53|4|Tato kebala ohi, ya tara prati ohirupe prerita haya
53|5|take siksa dana karechena pracanda saktisali [1]
53|6|saundaryapurna satta [1]. Atahpara tini sthira hayechilena [2]
53|7|ara tini chilena urdhbadigante [1]
53|8|tarapara tini tara kachakachi halena, atahpara khuba kachakachi
53|9|Phale tadera madhye du dhanukera byabadhana ra'ila athaba tara'o kama [1].
53|10|Takhana allah‌ tamra bandara prati ya ohi karara ta ohi karalena [1]
53|11|ya tini dekhechena, tara antahkarana ta mithya baleni [1]
53|12|tini ya dekhechena tomara ki se bisaye tamra sange bitarka karabe
53|13|ara abasya'i tini take arekabara dekhechilena
53|14|‘sidaratula muntaha’ tatha prantabarti kula gacha era kache [1]
53|15|yara kache jannatula ma’oya [1] abasthita.
53|16|Yakhana kula gachatike ya acchadita karara ta acchadita karechila [1]
53|17|tara drsti bibhrama hayani, drsti laksyacyuta'o hayani [1].
53|18|Abasya'i tini tara rabera mahana nidarsanabalira kichu dekhechilena
53|19|ata'eba, tomara amake jana'o ‘lata’ o ‘uyaya' samparke
53|20|ebam trtiya arekati ‘manata’ samparke [1]
53|21|tabe ki tomadera jan'ya putra santana ebam allahara jan'ya kan'ya santana
53|22|e rakama bantana to asangata [1].

53|23|Egulo kichu nama matra ya tomara o tomadera purbapurusara rekhecha, yara samarthane allah‌ kono dalilapramana nayila karenani. Tara to anumana ebam nijedera prabrttira'i anusarana kare, athaca tadera kache tadera rabera paksa theke hedayata eseche [1].
53|24|Manusa ya caya ta'i ki se paya
53|25|bastutah akherata o duniya allah‌ra'i
